```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
file <- "01_table.csv"
df <- read_csv(file)
```

```{r}
df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, value, z = paste(name, value)))+
  geom_point()+
  theme_bw() ->
  plot

plotly::ggplotly(plot, tooltip = "z")

```
